name: Backwards quest
description:
You find yourself in a room, there is a dead body beside a strange note, and to the north there is a doorway.

You were dead a few seconds ago, but now you aren't. Who are you? Where are you? I'll do you one better: Why are you? Should you go through the doorway?

Controls

* WASD or Arrow Keys to move

* SPACE or LeftClick or ENTER to attack

Tutorial

* Press the 'What?!' button ingame after clicking 'Play'

FAQ
  • I don't like the size of the game in my browser -> Try a downloadable version
  • Why are the files so big? -> Godot :shrug:
